charges.charge_description: 21:846 w/Forfeiture Allegation CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - Methamphetamine - Schedule II(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to BOP 360 months. This term consists of 360 months on Count 1 and 120 months on Count 2 of the Indictment, to be served concurrently. Supervised Release 4 years. This term consists of 4 years on Count 1 and 3 years on Count 2, to be served concurrently. Special Assessment $200. AMENDED JUDGMENT (6/26/13): Committed to BOP 144 months. This term consists of 144 months on Count 1 and 120 months on Count 2 of the Indictment, to be served concurrently. Supervised Release: 4 years. This term consists of 4 years on Count 1 and 3 years on Count 2, to be served concurrently. Special Assessment: $200.00.
